Text: Thanks for the up!  This file is a lot lighter to carry across campus than the book is!  And very well indexed, too.  Each section is its own pdf file.  Makes it easy to print only what you need.

If someone seeds this torrent, once I've received it all I will seed for a year.

I purchased the James Stewart calculus book (which I find excellent material) years ago and am kind of pissed that my uni switched textbooks completely. I'm not in the mood to fork out $100 for yet another paperweight.

Does anyone happen to have the accompanying student/instructor solution manual? If so can someone put it up.

ISBN: 0072869577
Thanks RevolutioN2012 for this excellent book.Your efforts are greatly appreciated.
Please seeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeed..... I need the book urgently :)
